articles.description: Late finishes are the norm this season and have always plagued the league - this is not ideal for the viewers, the broadcasters and, by extension, the IPL itself
articles.content: FeatureLate finishes are the norm this season and have always plagued the league - this is not ideal for the viewers, the broadcasters and, by extension, the IPL itself

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'We're talking about Shaw…': Agarkar hits back after Sehwag's strong words - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Delhi Capitals Assistant coach Ajit Agarkar defended his top order saying that it is not right to single out Prithvi Shaw and Sarfaraz Khan. | Cricket
articles.content: The struggles of Prithvi Shaw and Sarfaraz Khan against top-quality pace attacks have been the talking point in Delhi Capitals' crushing defeats in IPL 2023 so far. Prithvi Shaw has scored 19 runs in… [+3450 chars]

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: IPL 2023: With Brutal Shubman Gill Comparison, Virender Sehwag's Reality Check For Prithvi Shaw - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Virender Sehwag was highly unimpressed by Prithvi Shaw's batting in IPL 2023 as he compared him with peers Shubman Gill and Ruturaj Gaikwad.
articles.content: Delhi Capitals failed to open their win account, going down to Gujarat Titans in their second match of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2023 season. Though there are several areas where Delhi need to … [+1682 chars]
